synopsis.text: It's just another day in the Toujou household, where the mischievous succubus Maria never misses an opportunity to stir up trouble. Today, she sets her sights on creating a misunderstanding between Basara and Mio, resulting in an unfortunate outcome for Basara. Despite the chaos, Yuki remains unfazed, taking everything in stride. As the day unfolds, Basara finds himself in a series of awkward situations at school, eventually landing in nurse Hasegawa Chisato's infirmary. Back home, Maria takes it upon herself to plan Mio's birthday celebration, setting the stage for an evening filled with surprises. This special episode, originally bundled with the seventh volume of the Shinmai Maou no Testament manga, follows Basara's eventful day from morning to night, culminating in a birthday party orchestrated by Maria, who has a unique plan to bring Mio and Basara closer together. Prepare for a day filled with laughter, misunderstandings, and a hint of romance in this exciting OVA!
